reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an outstanding professor with a passion for the subject. Her lectures are engaging and she makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is knowledgeable and helpful, though his lectures can sometimes be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's classes are informative, but the material can be challenging. A lot of self-study is required.

reviews.subject: History of Art
reviews.review: Prof. Brown brings history to life with his enthusiasm and deep knowledge of the subject. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is a good professor who explains economic concepts clearly. However, her assignments can be time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Computer Science Principles
reviews.review: Prof. Miller's teaching style is unorganized, and it can be difficult to follow along with his lectures.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is a great professor who makes biology interesting. Her exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is passionate about the environment and provides valuable insights. His class is both educational and inspiring.

reviews.subject: Modern Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is knowledgeable but her lectures can sometimes lack structure. Reading assignments are extensive.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson explains statistical concepts well and is always available for help. The course workload is manageable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is an exceptional professor with a deep understanding of philosophical concepts. Her discussions are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Physical Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is knowledgeable but the course material is very challenging. Expect to spend a lot of time studying.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. White is engaging and makes sociology relatable. The course is well-structured and provides a good overview of the subject.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Prof. Clark's teaching method is not very effective. The class is difficult to follow, and he provides minimal feedback.

reviews.subject: Advanced Algebra
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is very helpful and provides clear explanations. The course is challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Walker is an excellent professor who encourages critical thinking. His lectures are engaging and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is knowledgeable, but the course can be overwhelming due to the volume of material covered.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Young is very enthusiastic and provides practical examples. The course gives a good introduction to engineering principles.

reviews.subject: Public Speaking
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is an exceptional instructor who helps students build confidence in public speaking. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Computer Programming
reviews.review: Prof. Adams is knowledgeable and provides practical coding exercises. The class is challenging but beneficial for learning programming.

reviews.subject: Cultural Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is a fantastic professor with a deep understanding of cultural anthropology. Her classes are engaging and informative.
